## Government Tender Announcement
### Project Title: Low Permeability Liner and Dredge Material Site Management at Little River Small Craft Harbour

**Reference Number:** WS4021789493

**Publication Date:** May 25, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** June 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact:** Gary Bryant, [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Project Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) requires a contractor to construct and install a low permeability liner and surface water control features for the Dredge Material Management Site at Little River Small Craft Harbour, Victoria County, Nova Scotia.

The work under this project includes:

* Provision of all plant, labour, equipment, and materials necessary to perform the work
* Construction and installation of the low permeability liner and surface water control features

**Bid Requirements:**

* The estimated value of this opportunity is between $500,001 and $1,000,000
* A bid security will be required for this tender during Phase Two
* Delivery date is estimated to be 18 weeks after award of contract

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Geographic Scope:**

* This project is located in Nova Scotia, Canada

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Solicitation Procedure:**

* Invitation to Qualify

**Language of Contract:**

* English and/or French

You can access this solicitation on the Ariba system [here](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16392436?extsite=MTYzOTI0MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
